definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: An automatic software-development technique of interactive interface for intelligent instruments is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種智能儀表交互界面的軟件開發自動化技術。

sentences.english: The front defrosting duct assembly and the dashboard body are assembled together.
sentences.chinese: 前除霜風道總成和儀表板本體裝配在一起。

sentences.english: Small drops of glass can be used instead of jewels in many electric instruments.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃顆粒可代替寶石軸承安裝在電器儀表內。

sentences.english: You must now generate some events to see data in the dashboard.
sentences.chinese: 您現在必鬚生成一些事件，以在儀表板中查看數據。

sentences.english: As a qualified soldier, you must keep your uniform tidy and have powerful posture.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個合格的軍人，必須儀表整潔軍姿威武。

sentences.english: Photometric sensors are devices that measure energy in the visible spectrum .
sentences.chinese: 測光傳感器是測定可見光譜中能量的儀表。

sentences.english: The instrument can replace the multi-block pointer meters to complete the same functions.
sentences.chinese: 該儀表可取代多塊指針儀表，完成相同功能。

sentences.english: The instrument can replace the multi-block pointer meters to complete the same functions.
sentences.chinese: 該儀表可取代多塊指針儀表，完成相同功能。

sentences.english: And suddenly you look at the gas mileage on the car on the dashboard.
sentences.chinese: 突然你看到汽車儀表盤上的油耗情況。

sentences.english: A suit of CAN bus based on the existed intelligence control instruments is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了利用現有控溫儀表構建一套CAN總線系統。

sentences.english: The left pocket incorporates a dual pass-through slot for pens, chem-lights and tire gauges.
sentences.chinese: 左口袋採用了雙傳遞筆筒槽，化學，儀表燈和輪胎。

sentences.english: Main instrumentation, industrial valves and supporting the relevant products.
sentences.chinese: 主營自動化儀表，工業閥門及配套的相關機電產品。

sentences.english: The TEWS (Tactical Electronic Warfare System) is positioned in the upper right corner of the instrument panel .
sentences.chinese: 電子戰術威脅顯示器位於儀表板的右上方。

sentences.english: The analog display instrument and the digital display instrument are the two styles of the traditional recorder.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的顯示記錄儀表有模擬式和數字式兩種。

sentences.english: It's something where there is a really heavy thing based at one corner, and there's a lot of dials and gauges and everything.
sentences.chinese: 它是有一個角的蠻沉的東西，而且有很多儀表和錶盤。

sentences.english: Spectris plc is a supplier of instrumentation and controls.
sentences.chinese: 思百吉公司是一家儀器儀表和控制產品供應商。

definition: untainted by even a speck of dust (idiom); selfless and incorruptible/spotless
not one thread loose (idiom); strictly according to the rules/meticulous/not one hair out of place
everything clear and orderly (idiom); neat and tidy
cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
to have an imposing or impressive appearance/impressive appearance/straight and impressive looking
